name: Fade Game
description:
You come home to your old house to find out what happened to your family. Where are they? Is your family lost? There is nothing but pure darkness and all you have is your old wax candle lamp.. Try to survive the night by finding items to burn and use them at the right time to keep your light from fading and avoiding the terrors that lurk.

Controls:

W, A, S, D = movement

Mouse look

Game created by:

Sean Garavan (SLG) - Music/SFX

Welliton Souza (Wellzitu) - Art/3D Models/Textures

Akusan - Programmer/Design
